thread.title: Olympics-Short Track-Men's 500m heats results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Olympics-Short Track-Men's 500m heats results
text: Feb 20 (Gracenote) - Olympic short track men's 500m heats results in Pyeongchang on Tuesday. Time Heat 1 1. Wu Dajing (China) 40.264 seconds Q 2. Bartosz Konopko (Poland) 41.039 Q 3. Andy Jung (Australia) 1:03.137 4. Thibaut Fauconnet (France) 1:04.756 . Aaron Tran (U.S.) PEN Heat 2 1. Samuel Girard (Canada) 40.493 Q 2. Roberts Zvejnieks (Latvia) 40.563 Q 3.
